original_text: They took their strong cities and their good land for themselves. The houses of those people were full of many good things. Your people could use the things that were already there. They had their wells, their vineyards, their olive trees and other fruit trees. They had as much food as they could eat, so they became fat. The many good things that you gave them made them very happy.
korean_text: 그들이 견고한 성읍들과 기름진 땅을 점령하고 모든 아름다운 물건이 가득한 집과 판 우물과 포도원과 감람원과 허다한 과목을 차지하여 배불리 먹어 살찌고 주의 큰 복을 즐겼사오나

sentences.original_text: and their good land for themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 좋은 땅을 자신들을 위해 차지했습니다

sentences.original_text: The houses of those people were full
Your people could use the things
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 백성은 그것들을 사용할 수 있었고

sentences.original_text: their olive trees and other fruit trees
They had as much food as they could eat
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 먹을 수 있는 만큼의 음식을 가졌기에

sentences.original_text: The many good things that you gave them
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 그들에게 주신 많은 좋은 것들이
